vehicle_listing.title: 4X4 Santa Monica V6 Turbo
vehicle_listing.description: The 4X4 Santa Monica V6 Turbo delivers unstoppable performance with a turbocharged V6 and advanced 4WD. Built for adventure, it’s perfect for both off-road trails and city streets.
vehicle_listing.subtitle: Power, performance, and versatility in one rugged ride.

vehicle_listing.title: NEW AWD Montreal 170 crew Sprinter
vehicle_listing.subtitle: VAN TRAVEL MANUAL
vehicle_listing.description: Introducing the epitome of adventure: the camper van AWD Montreal 170 Crew Sprinter, where every journey is a manual masterpiece crafted from high-quality components. This camper van isn't just a vehicle; it's an invitation to embrace the thrill of active recreation and the freedom of the open road. Discover the ultimate in van life luxury with our fully-loaded AWD 170 Crew Sprinter Van. This exceptional model features original factory Mercedes DOT-approved seating for five, making it perfect for family adventures or group travels.

vehicle_listing.title: AWD 144 Sprinter Santa Monica
vehicle_listing.description: Experience ultimate family travel in the Santa Monica Layout AWD 144 Sprinter, designed to comfortably sleep up to five with convertible seating and a modern wet bath.
vehicle_listing.subtitle: Versatile Comfort for Unforgettable Family Adventures

feature_highlights.title: Convertible Living
feature_highlights.description: Our innovative living area features an elevator bed that seamlessly rises to create a comfortable sleeping space, paired with a dinette area complete with storage benches. The versatile swivel table easily transforms into an additional bed, maximizing space and ensuring a flexible, multi-functional interior.

feature_highlights.title: Robust Electrical System
feature_highlights.description: Power your adventures with confidence using a robust 1200 amp-hour electrical system. Integrated solar panels, along with shore power and alternator charging options, provide a reliable and versatile energy source that keeps your van running smoothly off-grid.

feature_highlights.title: Spacious Roof Deck
feature_highlights.description: Step onto a functional roof that offers a spacious decking area, perfect for outdoor relaxation. Complete with hammocks, a side ladder, and a roof rack equipped with a light bar, this area transforms your van into a versatile outdoor oasis for stargazing, lounging, and enjoying the open air.

feature_highlights.title: Year-Round Comfort
feature_highlights.description: Power your adventures with confidence using a robust 1200 amp-hour electrical system. Integrated solar panels, along with shore power and alternator charging options, provide a reliable and versatile energy source that keeps your van running smoothly off-grid.

feature_highlights.title: Advanced Climate Control
feature_highlights.description: Stay comfortable in any weather with our 12V roof-mounted air conditioning system. This is paired with an advanced glycol diesel water and air heater that ensures efficient warmth during colder conditions, creating a perfectly balanced climate control solution for your travels.
